award_title: CAREER: Investigating the source, transport and deposition of economically important metals in the lower continental crust
subject: Do your data pipelines still run after your students graduate?
body:
Geochemical workflows are a pain to keep reproducibleâ€”dependencies shift, the grad student who wrote the calibration script moves on, and suddenly nothing runs.

Building Ouro to fix this: a platform where computational methods become reusable infrastructure so others can run your workflows without reimplementing.

Quick chat in January?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
